about_the_game:
After purchase, you will get the right to use the official background.

【Contents】
  • Stage background
  • Room background

New backgrounds that will be continuously updated in the future will be included in this DLC
detailed_description:
After purchase, you will get the right to use the official background.

【Contents】
  • Stage background
  • Room background

New backgrounds that will be continuously updated in the future will be included in this DLC

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15.7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. IOS IphoneX And Our FaceTracking Application
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15.7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. IOS IphoneX And Our FaceTracking Application

name: V-Skin 3D Offical Stage Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 1.8 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. IOS IphoneX And Our FaceTracking Application
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 4GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. IOS IphoneX And Our FaceTracking Application

supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
